person.persName: John A. Loughridge (Mason County, KY, merchant & grocer)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, merchant and grocer. Indiana native. Married to Cindarilla E. Bryant Loughridge in Mason County on November 30, 1858. Father of Lucy M. Loughridge. Merchant in Mason County in 1860. Grocer in Mason County in 1863.
